job.jobname: ! EG: ICL verkoopfactuur kopiëren naar verkoopadministratie (483)

step.datasource: select top 150 CONVERT(varchar(50),b400.id) AS ID, b400.Filename from [483].dbo.gbkmut as g483 with (nolock) INNER JOIN [483].dbo.cicmpy as c483 on c483.crdnr = g483.crdnr INNER JOIN [400].dbo.BacoDiscussions as b400 with (nolock) on b400.OurRef = g483.docnumber LEFT OUTER JOIN [483].dbo.BacoDiscussions as b483 with (nolock) on b483.Type = 7 and b483.YOurRef = b400.OurRef where 1=1 and g483.transtype = 'N' and g483.transsubtype = 'T' and g483.reknr = ' 1601' and b483.id IS NULL and b400.CreatedDate > (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - 365) Order by b400.hid desc

select top 150 '7' as Type, '%abeipath%Temp/%runid%/' + b400.Filename as FileName ,b400.Subject , bkstnr_sub as OrderNumber, g483.faktuurnr as OurRef, g483.docnumber as YourRef, c483.cmp_wwn as Associate, c483.cnt_id as AccContactID, 'Uploaded by ABEI' as Body, 'I' as Source from [483].dbo.gbkmut as g483 with (nolock) INNER JOIN [483].dbo.cicmpy as c483 on c483.crdnr = g483.crdnr INNER JOIN [400].dbo.BacoDiscussions as b400 with (nolock) on b400.OurRef = g483.docnumber LEFT OUTER JOIN [483].dbo.BacoDiscussions as b483 with (nolock) on b483.Type = 7 and b483.YOurRef = b400.OurRef where 1=1 and g483.transtype = 'N' and g483.transsubtype = 'T' and g483.reknr = ' 1601' and b483.id IS NULL and b400.CreatedDate > (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - 365) Order by b400.hid desc
